member_organisations: Members are individuals not organisations. Members are the Chief Legal Officers of major multinational European corporations. Membership is by invitation only.
fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Competition, Consumers, Justice and Fundamental Rights, External Relations
head_office_address: c/o Mary Mullally 1 Percy Place London Road
eu_initiatives: The EGCA meeting in June 2015 included a presentation on  the structure of the European Commission from a representative of Martin Selmayr
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: The EGCA holds two meetings a year, one in the spring and one in the Fall and this is the main focus for the membership.  Representatives from the European Commission are occasionally invited to speak at these meetings
